Deleting your cache directory will cause: 刪除快取目錄會導致您失去某些設定。除非有 Streamlabs 工作人員的指示，否則不要刪除快取目錄
Confirm stream title and game before goi: 在開始直播前確認直播標題與遊戲
Enable reporting additional information: 啟用當機時報告其他資訊 (需要重新啟動)
WARNING! You will lose all scenes, sourc: 警告！您會失去所有場景、來源與設定。此動作無法復原！
Your cache directory has been successful: 您的快取目錄已成功上傳。檔案名稱 %{file} 已複製到您的剪貼簿。
Stream Labels session has been successfu: Stream Labels 作業已成功重新啟動！
This action will restart the application: 此動作會重新啟動應用程式。要繼續嗎？
Show confirmation dialog when starting s: 開始直播時顯示確認對話方塊
Show confirmation dialog when stopping s: 停止直播時顯示確認對話方塊
Snap Sources to edge of screen: 將來源對齊到螢幕邊緣
Snap Sources to other sources: 將來源與其他來源對齊
Enforce streaming service bitrate limits: 執行直播服務位元速率限制
Encoder Preset (Higher = Less CPU): 編碼器預先設定 (較高 = 較少 CPU)
Generate File Name without Space: 產生沒有空格的檔案名稱
Bilinear (Fastest, but blurry if scaling: 雙線性 (速度最快，但縮放時會模糊)
Bicubic (Sharpened scaling, 16 samples): 雙三次插值 (銳利的縮放結果，16 點取樣)
Lanczos (Sharpened scaling, 32 samples): Lanczos 演算法 (銳利的縮放結果，32 點取樣)
No elements found. Consider changing the: 找不到元素。請考慮變更搜尋查詢。
Do not back up my media files in the clo: 不要將我的媒體檔案備份到雲端 (必須重新啟動應用程式)
Disable Windows audio ducking: 停用 Windows 音量自動調整
Preserved cutoff point (increase delay): 重新連線時保留的截斷點 (增加延遲)
Single click selects group. Double click: 按一下選擇群組，按兩下選擇項目
Double click selects group. Single click: 按兩下選擇群組，按一下選擇項目
Navigate to Live tab when going live: 進行直播時移動到直播標籤
Streaming to a custom ingest is advanced: 「直播到自訂攝取」是進階功能。某些功能可能會停止運作。
Disable hardware acceleration (requires: 停用硬體加速 (必須重新啟動)
Deleting your cache directory will cause: 刪除快取目錄會導致您失去某些設定。除非有 Streamlabs 工作人員的指示，否則不要刪除快取目錄。
You can not change these settings when y: 直播時不能變更這些設定
This feature is intended for overlay des: 此功能的用途是讓疊層設計者匯出其作品供我們的主題商店使用。並非所有的來源都能匯出，使用時需自行承擔風險。
Change the look of Streamlabs Desktop wi: 使用 Prime 變更 Streamlabs Desktop 的外觀
Maximum custom destinations has been add: 已新增最大自訂目的地數量
The Virtual Webcam plugin needs to be up: 虛擬網路攝影機外掛程式在啟動之前需要更新。這需要管理員權限。
Virtual Webcam requires administrator pr: 虛擬網路攝影機需要管理員權限才能安裝在您系統上。
Virtual webcam is <status>Running</statu: 虛擬網路攝影機<status>執行中</status>
If the virtual webcam does not appear in: 如果虛擬網路攝影機沒有出現在其他應用程式中，您可能需要重新啟動您的電腦。
Virtual Webcam allows you to display you: 虛擬網路攝影機讓您可以在視訊會議軟體中從 Streamlabs Desktop 顯示您的場景。Streamlabs Desktop 會顯示為可以在大部分視訊會議應用程式中選取的網路攝影機。
Uninstalling Virtual Webcam will remove: 解除安裝虛擬網路攝影機會移除其在其他應用程式作為裝置的選項。
Uninstall Virtual Webcam: 解除安裝虛擬網路攝影機
The diagnostic report is an automaticall: The diagnostic report is an automatically generated report that contains information about your system and configuration. Clicking the upload button below will generate and securely transmit a diagnostic report to the Streamlabs team.
There was an error uploading the diagnos: There was an error uploading the diagnostic report. Please try again, and let the Streamlabs Streamer Success team know if the issue persists.
The diagnostic report was securely uploa: The diagnostic report was securely uploaded, and the Report ID below has been copied to your clipboard. Please provide the Report ID to the Streamlabs Streamer Success Team.
Show announcements for new Streamlabs fe: Show announcements for new Streamlabs features and products
